title: createMqQueue
description: schema defining valid JSON for creating a BigIP Load Balancer configuration

application.description: the name of the application the load balancer is for (must be valid Fasit application)

environmentName.description: the name of the environment the load balancer will be used in (must be valid Fasit environment)

environmentClass.description: the environment class of the environment

fasitAlias.description: alias in fasit for the BigIP load balancer
